thread.title: Robin Wright Ben Foster call off engagement again
thread.title_full: Robin Wright Ben Foster call off engagement again

title: Robin Wright Ben Foster call off engagement again
text:
Robin Wright, Ben Foster call off engagement again 
Technology Industry News.Net (IANS) : Sunday 30th August, 2015 
Actors Robin Wright and Ben Foster have reportedly called off their engagement, the second time they have done so after parting ways in November. 
The two ended their engagement a few months ago. The reason that prompted their separation was not known, a source told people.com. 
Wright, 49, and Foster, 34, have not commented on the report yet. The two met on the set of the 2011 film "Rampart" and were romantically linked in early 2012 when they were spotted getting cozy in Australia. 
They got engaged in January 2014 and called off their 10-month engagement back in November due to their hectic schedules and age gap. 
In January this year, Wright and Foster were photographed attending the 2015 Golden Globes. 
They were last seen together at the premiere of the film "Palio" at Tribeca Film Festival in April. More Technology Industry News Russian Nuclear Official Pleads Guilty To Corruption In U.S. Technology Industry News.Net
